title: Very light font
content:
Used last year on my business cards and can’t get a hold of graphic designer to make updates

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fontidhelp.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090819081428/http:/typophile.com/files/fontidhelp.jpg) | 4.7 KB |
author: KatieK

comments.content:
Genius! You are so right! Thank you so much!

Do you know where do download this font? Preferably for free?
IT’s commercial, it’s not free. It may be on your computer by default, though.
It is not going to cost you too much if you just buy the light version.
